entry.title: Arduino Workshop - Tomorrow
entry.content: Tomorrow, from 3:30PM to 5:30PM in ERC1096 we will be running a workshop on development with an Arduino microcontroller. This event is for everyone and no previous experience is required. We will explain everything needed to begin writing programs for the Arduino as well as interacting with hardware in order to build systems which interact with their physical environment. Registration is not needed - just show up. Hope to see you there!

entry.title: UOIT ENGSOC Engineering Conference
entry.content: From March 8th to March 10th UOIT Engineering Students’ Society will be hosting the UOIT Engineering conference. For more details and to RSVP click here. Registration can be found at http://goo.gl/forms/kzHflzueoO

entry.title: Git and Github Workshop Slides
entry.content: Last week, on November 18th, SEEK ran a workshop on Git and Github. We covered the basics about how it works, how it can be used to manage code development, and how it can be used for simple (static-content) web hosting. The slides are available here.
